sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The lcms package contains the liblcms libraries, icc2ps, icclink, icctrans and optionally, tifficc, jpegicc, _lcms library and lcms.py.

sect3.title: liblcms library
sect3.para: The liblcms libraries are used by other programs to provide color management facilities.

sect3.title: icc2ps
sect3.para: icc2ps generates PostScript CRD or CSA from ICC profiles.

sect3.title: icclink
sect3.para: icclink links two or more profiles into a single devicelink profile.

sect3.title: icctrans
sect3.para: icctrans is a ColorSpace conversion calculator.

sect3.title: tifficc
sect3.para: tifficc is an ICC profile applier for TIFF files.

sect3.title: jpegicc
sect3.para: jpegicc is an ICC profile applier for JPEG files.
